TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MemoryCacheElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class MemoryCacheElement Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 定义一个用于配置基于 类的缓存的元素。

span.span: Defines an element that is used to configure a cache that is based on the class.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义可以用于配置缓存的元素。The class defines a element that you can use to configure the cache. 可以在单个应用程序中使用 类的多个实例。Multiple instances of the class can be used in a single application. 配置文件中的每个 `memoryCache` 元素可以包含一个命名 实例的设置。Each `memoryCache` element in the configuration file can contain settings for a named instance. `memoryCache` 元素需要 `namedCaches` 子元素。The `memoryCache` element requires a `namedCaches` child element. 若要定义除默认配置之外的缓存的命名配置，可以添加 `namedCaches` 元素。To define named configurations of the cache in addition to the default configuration, you can add `namedCaches` elements. 有关如何添加命名缓存配置的详细信息，请参阅[<namedCaches> 元素（缓存设置）](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to add named cache configurations, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <memoryCache> Element (Cache Settings)
<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 某个特定缓存配置的唯一名称。

span.span: The unique name for a specific cache configuration.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CacheMemoryLimitMegabytes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CacheMemoryLimitMegabytes : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的实例可增长到的最大内存大小（以兆字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum memory size, in megabytes, that an instance of a object can grow to.

value.span: 最大内存量（以兆字节为单位）。

span.span: The amount of maximum memory size, in megabytes.

value.span: 默认值为零，指示 实例会基于计算机上安装的内存量来管理自己的内存。

span.span: The default is zero, which indicates that instances manage their own memory based on the amount of memory that is installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值表示 `namedCaches` 配置元素中的 `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` 配置特性。The property value represents the `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` configuration attribute in the `namedCaches` configuration element. 如果缓存大小超过指定的限制，则内存缓存实现将删除缓存条目。If the cache size exceeds the specified limit, the memory cache implementation removes cache entries. 可以在 `namedCaches` 元素中单独设置此属性，其中每个 `namedCaches` 元素对应于唯一的缓存配置。This property can be set individually in `namedCaches` elements, with each `namedCaches` element corresponding to a unique cache configuration. 可以从配置文件中的 `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` 配置特性读取 属性的设置。The settings for the property can be read from the `cacheMemoryLimitMegabytes` configuration attribute in the configuration file. 此外，还可以在初始化 类时传递这些设置。Alternatively, the settings can be passed when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置缓存的详细信息，请参阅[<namedCaches> 元素（缓存设置）](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置某个特定缓存配置的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a particular cache configuration.
The name of a cache configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值是特定命名缓存配置的唯一标识符。The property value is the unique identifier for a particular named cache configuration. 每个缓存配置都必须具有唯一的 ID。Each cache configuration must have a unique ID. 在配置文件的 `memoryCache` 节中，唯一的缓存配置由 `namedCaches` 配置集合定义。In the `memoryCache` section of a configuration file, a unique cache configuration is defined by a `namedCaches` configuration collection. 每个命名缓存条目都需要在配置文件中具有唯一的名称。Each named cache entry requires a unique name in the configuration file. 此值的长度必须至少为一个字符。This value must be at least one character long. 有关如何配置缓存的详细信息，请参阅[<namedCaches> 元素（缓存设置）](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PhysicalMemoryLimitPercentage : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存可使用的服务器内存的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the percentage of server memory that can be used by the cache.

value.span: 缓存可使用的物理内存的百分比（用一个介于 1 到 100 之间的整数值表示）。

span.span: The percentage of physical memory that the cache can use, expressed as an integer value from 1 to 100.

value.span: 默认值为零，指示 实例会基于计算机上安装的内存量来管理自己的内存。

span.span: The default is zero, which indicates that instances manage their own memory based on the amount of memory that is installed on the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓存大小超过指定的限制，则内存缓存实现将删除缓存条目。If the cache size exceeds the specified limit, the memory cache implementation removes cache entries. 可以从应用程序配置文件中 `physicalMemoryLimitPercentage` 配置特性读取 属性的设置。The setting for the property can be read from `physicalMemoryLimitPercentage` configuration attribute in the application configuration file. 此外，还可以在初始化 类时传递该值。Alternatively, the value can be passed when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置缓存的详细信息，请参阅[<namedCaches> 元素（缓存设置）](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PollingInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.PollingInterval : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示缓存实现将当前内存负载与为缓存实例设置的绝对内存和内存百分比限制进行比较所采用的时间间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the time interval after which the cache implementation compares the current memory load against the absolute and percentage-based memory limits that are set for the cache instance.

value.span: 缓存实现将当前内存负载与为缓存实例设置的绝对内存和内存百分比限制进行比较所采用的时间间隔。

span.span: The time interval after which the cache implementation compares the current memory load against the absolute and percentage-based memory limits that are set for the cache instance.
The default is two minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对应于 `namedCaches` 元素的 `pollingInterval` 配置特性。The property corresponds to the `pollingInterval` configuration attribute of the `namedCaches` element. 此配置特性的设置是以 `HH:MM:SS` 格式指定的，并且可以从应用程序配置中的 `pollingInterval` 配置特性读取。The settings for this configuration attribute are specified in the format `HH:MM:SS` and can be read from the `pollingInterval` configuration attribute in the application configuration. 此外，还可以在初始化 类时传递该值。Alternatively, the value can be passed when the class is initialized. 有关如何配置缓存的详细信息，请参阅[<namedCaches> 元素（缓存设置）](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings)。For more information about how to configure the cache, see [<namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/namedcaches-element-cache-settings).

span.span: <namedCaches> Element (Cache Settings)

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
